title: Idea for panthion Q ability
body: So, i have thought of an idea for his q where it becomes a skillshot instead of lock on but increase the range the about ezreals's q

replies.body: TBH I think Pantheon E passive should also make him do reduced crit damage kinda like Yasuo because vsing 100% crit ain't fun when you're an ADC.
It's called certain death for a reason, also the idea is dumb. You change him from a lane bully/gank heavy jgler to a late game sieger. WTF is the point of that

Well I didn't know "Certain Death" meant being able to kill an entire back line from a single cast of E, maybe that's fun to play against in low elo but I personally don't enjoy vsing something that's so snowbally and has very little counterplay during early to mid game.

New Q Idea:
- Long range skillshot. --> Siege + Poke turning Panth into an AD meta pick for mid and top lane.
- Does more damage. --> Balanced by having to aim it.
- New passive, if Q lands on a target within 4s that was stunned by W then the "Direct Hit" passive is applied which reduces movement speed and armor. --> Places Pantheon in a more rewarding lane bully status for people who have mechanics and knowledge about lane match-ups not just able to mash keys (Would probably need CD's balanced out for the whole kit).
